sentences.sContent: On a clear night, I could see stars twinkling in the sky.
sentences.sContent_eng: On a clear night, I could see stars twinkling in the sky.
sentences.sCn: 在晴朗的夜晚，我可以看见星星在天空闪烁。

sentences.sContent: Miss heart only stars know, heart desire only you know, when you see the stars twinkling in the sky, is my best wishes to you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Miss heart only stars know, heart desire only you know, when you see the stars twinkling in the sky, is my best wishes to you.
sentences.sCn: 思念的心只有星星知道，心中的愿望只有你知道，当你看见星星闪烁的夜空，就是我的祝福在向你致意。
